official_title: To continue the suspension of duties on certain power driven flatbed knitting machines and on certain knitting machines designed for sweater strip or garment length knitting.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1995, the suspension of duty on: (1) certain power driven flatbed knitting machines, parts, and auxiliary machinery; and (2) certain knitting machines, parts, and auxiliary machinery designed for sweater strip and garment length knitting.

titles.title: To continue the suspension of duties on certain power driven flatbed knitting machines and on certain knitting machines designed for sweater strip or garment length knitting.
